channel.title: How to set up a cache 317
channel.description:
ok, so how do i set up my cache for a webclient. this is how my client folder is set up, i open my main folder i have 2 options, open another folder (with all the files) or click run
ok then if u go into files folder u see
added models cache(has folder anim, animations, signframe, clan chat, spirites and anims and a couple other Files and audio files below) -anim folder has - what looks like more models, but not ziped, they are Dat Files -animations are the same thing -signframe has 2 folders, custom and prayer -custom has a bunch of jag files and like 3 png files -prayer has 2 files, prayeroff and prayeron, under that it has a couple jag and a couple png files -prayeroff has a bunch of jag files -prayeron has a bunch of jag files -clanchat has a bunch of png files -spirites (too lazy to say, ask if u need to know) -anims bunch of dat files then the other files are (in the main folder) files javazoom manifest (empty) models oldsrites sign spirites user
and how do i set up my client folder to be4 i jar it (i dont need to sign it right?) like do i take our the cache folder, do i zip the cache? and leave it in the client folder somewhere?
thanks =D

item.title: How to set up a cache 317
item.dc:creator: @jwags jwags
item.description:
@jwags wrote:

ok, so how do i set up my cache for a webclient. this is how my client folder is set up, i open my main folder i have 2 options, open another folder (with all the files) or click run

ok then if u go into files folder u see

added models
cache(has folder anim, animations, signframe, clan chat, spirites and anims and a couple other Files and audio files below)
-anim folder has - what looks like more models, but not ziped, they are Dat Files
-animations are the same thing
-signframe has 2 folders, custom and prayer
-custom has a bunch of jag files and like 3 png files
-prayer has 2 files, prayeroff and prayeron, under that it has a couple jag and a couple png files
-prayeroff has a bunch of jag files
-prayeron has a bunch of jag files
-clanchat has a bunch of png files
-spirites (too lazy to say, ask if u need to know)
-anims bunch of dat files
then the other files are (in the main folder)
files
javazoom
manifest (empty)
models
oldsrites
sign
spirites
user

and how do i set up my client folder to be4 i jar it (i dont need to sign it right?) like do i take our the cache folder, do i zip the cache? and leave it in the client folder somewhere?

thanks =D

Read full topic
item.source: How to set up a cache 317
